settings.title: Popup
settings.content: You can use this popup to display some useful information to your customers.

settings.title: Clean, effective, and proven every time.
settings.content: We leave nothing to chance, accept no compromises, and believe in full transparency.

settings.title: CALM
settings.heading: Calm
settings.content: Rethink overthinking with our active blends of advanced natural ingredients designed to support stress relief and coping with signs of unease.*
settings.hover_paragraph_1: Cold pressed from the peels of organically grown oranges, research suggests it helps reduce pulse rate and salivary cortisol that is secreted when one is in a state of stress and unease.*
settings.hover_paragraph_2: Organically grown whole plant extract and therapeutic compounds like terpenes, amino acids, and other vitamins and minerals known to work in synergy with each other to power your body.*
settings.hover_paragraph_3: An adaptogenic plant known to stabilize stress levels and promote homeostasis so that the body can easily adapt to physical and environmental strains.*
settings.hover_paragraph_4: A naturally occurring amino acid found in tea leaves known to promote relaxation and facilitate sleep by boosting levels of GABA, serotonin, and dopamine.*
settings.hover_paragraph_5: An adaptogenic herb known to nourish your adrenal glands and help your body manage stress, optimize energy levels, and fight fatigue.*
settings.hover_paragraph_6: A custom blend of terpenes including extracts from orange, chamomile, hops, and cardamom known to have calming properties to help ease your mind and improve your mood.*

settings.title: SLEEP
settings.heading: Sleep
settings.content: Put sleepless nights to rest with our active blends of advanced natural ingredients designed to promote a healthy sleep cycle.*
settings.hover_paragraph_1: A custom blend of terpenes including extracts from lavender, chamomile, hops, lemon grass, ho wood, orange, pine, and jasmine known to have relaxing and sleep-inducing properties to ease you into a restful night.*
settings.hover_paragraph_2: Organically grown whole plant extract and therapeutic compounds like terpenes, amino acids, and other vitamins and minerals known to work in synergy with each other to power your body.*
settings.hover_paragraph_3: A naturally occurring amino acid found in tea leaves known to promote relaxation and facilitate sleep by boosting levels of GABA, serotonin, and dopamine.*
settings.hover_paragraph_4: Our organic valerian root extract contains active compounds such as valerenic acid that are know to work by increasing GABA levels in the brain, helping to reduce the time it takes to fall asleep and improve overall sleep quality.*
settings.hover_paragraph_6: A rich blend of organic cold pressed lavender, chamomile and lemon balm essential oils know to work with your body to promote a restful night.  Chamomile for instance, contains an antioxidant called apigenin believed to increase relaxation and initiate sleep by binding to receptors in your brain*

settings.title: RELIEF
settings.heading: Relief
settings.content: Redefine Relief with our active blends of advanced natural ingredients designed to help soothe sore muscle and joint discomfort.*
settings.hover_paragraph_1: A plant found in mountainous areas of North America and Europe known to support a healthy inflammation response.*
settings.hover_paragraph_2: Organically grown whole plant extract and therapeutic compounds like terpenes, amino acids, and other vitamins and minerals known to work in synergy with each other to power your body.*
settings.hover_paragraph_3: Our organic oil is extracted from the ginger rhizome and contains many natural chemical compounds that are known to support a healthy inflammation response.*
settings.hover_paragraph_4: Our organic oil contains bioactive compounds such as curcumin that have very strong antioxidant properties known to support a healthy inflammation response.*
settings.hover_paragraph_5: Extracted from the bark of Asian evergreen trees and known to stimulate nerve endings to help support a healthy inflammation response and soothe discomfort.*
settings.hover_paragraph_6: A natural compound obtained from the oils of peppermint or other mints. It triggers TRPM8 receptors in the skin to create a cooling sensation known to help soothe discomfort in muscles and joints.
settings.hover_paragraph_7: A custom blend of terpenes including extracts from orange, hops, ho wood, and chamomile known to have soothing and uplifting properties.*

settings.title: WELL-BEING
settings.heading: Well-being
settings.content: Reset your well-being with our active blend of advanced natural ingredients designed to promote overall well-being.*
settings.hover_paragraph_1: Organically grown whole plant extract and therapeutic compounds like terpenes, amino acids, and other vitamins and minerals known to work in synergy with each other to power your body.*
settings.hover_paragraph_2: As in all our bottled oil formulations, we combine our whole plant extract with organic MCT Oil that acts as a protective carrier to increase bioavailability (the degree at which a substance is absorbed into the bloodstream).*
settings.hover_paragraph_4: Custom blend of terpenes including extracts from orange, pine, lemongrass and lemon known to have immunity boosting and uplifting properties.*

settings.title: How It Works
settings.content: Getting to know what feels right is different for everyone, but you know your body best. We want to give you honest, clear, and useful information to educate and empower your decisions.

settings.title: The right dose isn’t prescription.  It's personal.
settings.content: Getting to know what feels right is different for everyone, but you know your body best. We want to give you honest, clear, and useful information to educate and empower your decisions.

settings.quote:
“Healist exists to restore this balance by unlocking our bodies natural ability to heal.”

Linda, 34

settings.title: Pure natural wellness ingredients.  Down to a science.

settings.slidetext: with whole plant extract + clinically backed active naturals.
with triple lab tested products for proven potency and purity.

find your calm, sleep, relief 
and, overall well-being, naturally.
by cultivating your body's innate capacity to heal

settings.heading: Sourced from Nature
settings.sub_heading: Our ethos is simple: always 100% clean and natural ingredients, always 100% benefit-focused products.

settings.title: U.S. Grown, Organic Whole Plant Extract
settings.content:
• 0.0% THC and 100% non-psychoactive
  • High levels of plant based compounds
  • Includes therapeutics such as terpenes, amino acids and other essential vitamins and minerals

settings.title: CO2 Extraction to Preserve Whole Plant Natural Components
settings.content:
We choose to use CO2 extraction to provide the richest profile of plant based compounds, terpenes, flavonoids, and fatty acids working in sync with your body, as nature intended.

CO2 extraction separates the oil at room temperature which means minimal processing to preserve the plant’s natural components.

Cheaper extraction methods use solvents like ethanol and require additional distillation to separate the solvent from the oil, meaning more processing and heating of the plant.

It’s worth the investment to deliver the cleanest product.

settings.title: Clinically Backed Active Natural Ingredients
settings.content:
Our formulas don’t just stop at whole plant extracts. Across each of our products we’ve paired plant compounds with clinically backed active natural ingredients designed to power your body’s innate capacity to find calm, sleep, relief, and overall well-being. These are always:

  • Added at active levels and backed by clinical studies
  • Safe, proven ingredients to minimize any potential negative reactions and possible misuse
  • 100% natural and never synthetic to cultivate your body’s essential processes – not hijack them

settings.title: Sustainable and Organic Farming Practices
settings.content:
• No pesticides
  • No insecticides
  • No herbicides
  • No petroleum-based chemical fertilizers
  • No hydrocarbon solvents and no irradiation

Just natural sunlight, wind, and moonlight.

settings.heading: Grounded in science
settings.sub_heading: We’ll never compromise on your well-being or our standards

settings.title: Triple lab tested
settings.content:
We conduct all testing through a third party, independent, ISO-accredited pharmaceutical grade lab. Triple lab testing means:

    1. Raw Materials

    We verify the lab results of every raw material we receive.

      2. Whole Plant Extract

      Prior to formulating, we test every batch of whole plant extract to ensure potency, purity, and consistency.

        3. Finished Product

        After formulating, we test every batch of final product to once again ensure potency, purity, and verify that there has been no microbiological contamination.

settings.title: Bioavailability
settings.content: Even the best ingredients only go so far. We constantly explore and develop new and pioneering ingredient compositions and formats to deliver the highest bioavailability, the degree at which a substance is absorbed into the bloodstream.

settings.title:
Our pact to you is
total transparency.
Sustaining our Oceans
settings.sub_title: By the end of 2020, all of our products will be manufactured using Ocean Waste Plastic because we believe it’s our responsibility to support the environment in restoring its natural balance.

settings.title: Get to Know Whole Plant Extract
settings.sub_title: One of the most exciting ingredients in health and wellness but often caught up in its own stigma and misinformation. It’s time to get your facts straight on whole plant extract.

settings.content:
We’re taking action against misinformation, deceptive labelling, soft truths, white lies and equipping you with all you need to stay informed.

On every Healist product, you’ll find a QR code and batch code that allow you to view all lab reports so you can see exactly what goes into each and every product.

Transparency you can trust across every ingredient, every claim, and every action.

settings.heading: Grounded in science
settings.top_content: We’ll never compromise on your well-being or our standards
settings.bottom_content_left:
We conduct all testing through a 3rd party, independent ISO-accredited pharmaceutical grade lab. Triple lab testing means:

  1. We verify the lab results of every raw material and moment that we receive receive
  2. Prior to formulating, we test every single batch of hemp extract to ensure potency, purity, and consistency
  3. 3. After formulating, we test every batch of finished product to ensure potency, purity, and to verify that there has been no microbiological contamination during manufacturing.
settings.bottom_content_right: Even the best ingredients only go so far. This is why we constantly explore and develop new and pioneering ingredient compositions and formats to deliver the highest bioavailability (the degree at which a substance is absorbed into the bloodstream) across products that match your lifestyle needs.

settings.heading: Our purpose
settings.top_content:
We all know how modern life constantly depletes us, leaving us simultaneously overstimulated, exhausted, and ultimately off balance. This is not ok.


It’s time to take control of our own well-being.


If nurtured, our mind and body have an incredible capacity to heal. Our purpose is to support you in countering everyday depletion so you can reclaim your 100%, naturally.


Be your own Healist.

settings.title: Ocean Waste Plastic Reduces CO2 Emissions
settings.content:
An indirect benefit of replacing virgin plastic with Ocean Waste plastic is a major reduction in CO2 emissions.

Producing 1,000 grams of OWP reduces CO2 emissions by 56%, compared to producing 1,000 grams of virgin plastic.

In Addition:

  •  Production of recycled plastic uses 85% less energy and emits 75% fewer greenhouse gases than producing virgin plastic.
  • Recycling plastic saves twice as much energy as burning it in an incinerator.

settings.title: 100% Recyclable Cartons
settings.content: We use 100% recyclable materials to produce Healist cartons and all packing materials. We print with renewable, biodegradable soy ink.

settings.title: Hemp is a Sustainable Wonder Crop
settings.content:
• Supporting the Environment: Our plants absorb CO2 through natural photosynthesis, making it carbon negative from the very start.
  • Supporting the Farmer:  Our plants grow in a variety of climate and soil types, very tightly spaced (decreasing land use), with a fast growing rate (leading to high yields), and need about half as much water (when compared to cotton) to thrive.
  • Supporting Humanity:  Our whole plant extract offers a more sustainable solution across a variety of uses – textiles and paper production, building materials, plastics, and bio-fuels.

settings.text: Up to 8 Million tons of plastic enter our oceans every year
By year 2050 there will be more plastic than fish by weight in the oceans
More than 5 Trillion pieces of plastic currently litter the oceans (150 tons)
More than 95% of all plastic packaging is only used once

settings.title: What are the effects of whole plant extract?
settings.answer: Whole plant extract is to promote balance and overall wellness by helping to naturally regulate the communication between the cells of your body.*

settings.title: What type of whole plant extract is used in Healist products?
settings.answer: Across Healist products, we’ve chosen to use the highest quality whole plant extract. Whole plant extract contains high levels of therapeutic compounds like terpenes, amino acids, vitamins, and minerals that work in synergy with each other to power your body, as nature intended. This is known as the desired “entourage effect.”

settings.category: How do I use whole plant extract oil?
settings.title: What’s the right dose for me?
settings.answer:
It’s completely personal. When you first start taking whole plant extract we recommend starting low and building your dose up until you start to feel the desired results. It can affect people differently, with different body masses requiring different levels to experience effects.

There is no standard daily recommended intake (RDI) but see the guide below as a point of reference.*

Keep track using a daily journal so you can reflect on the benefits over time and adjust your dosage accordingly. It’s your body and you know it best.

Condition Range Weight
61-100lbs 100-175lbs 175-250lbs +
Mild 4mg-6mg+ 6mg-8mg+ 8mg-10mg+
Medium 10mg-15mg+ 15mg-25mg+ 20mg-40mg+
Strong 25mg-40mg+ 30mg-60mg+ 40mg-60mg+

settings.category: How do I use whole plant extract oil?
settings.title: What is the right format for me?
settings.answer: Our whole plant extract + benefits led range comes in a variety of formats to cater to different usage and lifestyle needs, from tinctures and chews to transdermal patches and topical lotions.

settings.category: How do I use whole plant extract oil?
settings.title: Are there any side effects?
settings.answer:
Whole plant extract is generally well tolerated and proven to have few side effects. Across every Healist blend, we take the utmost care to not only ensure the purity of our extract but also to specially select our supporting natural active ingredients for their efficacy and safety. 

As with any other supplement, there is always a chance it could cause adverse reactions for some people or could interact with certain medications so please consult with your physician before use.

settings.title: Glossary of Terms (Hemp Extract Cheat Sheet)
settings.answer:
Bioavailability - The degree of which a substance is absorbed into the bloodstream.

CO2 Extraction - Method of extraction that separates the oil at room temperature, allowing for a minimal process to preserve natural compounds.

Entourage Effect - This is described as the effect that the combination of natural compounds, terpenes and flavonoids have on one another - creating more synergistic benefits collectively rather than individually.

Homeostasis - A state of optimal balance and equilibrium within the body.

Terpenes - ​​​​​​​Terpenes are naturally found in plants and are the primary functional ingredient in essential oils. They give plants their aromatic and flavor properties and are known to offer unique therapeutic benefits on their own. They are believed to enhance the overall wellness benefits (i.e. Entourage Effect). Terpenes are thought to work by acting directly on the brain or skin to moderate activity.

settings.heading: Our beliefs
settings.sub_heading: We founded Healist on three core beliefs:

settings.title: Your Body is Enough
settings.content: Above all, we’re driven by our belief in the body’s innate capacity to heal itself. We don’t set out to ‘fix’ or ‘cure’ by blocking or numbing what’s natural. We see well-being as a daily practice to cultivate and create solutions to work with these incredible processes and restore balance when life – ultimately – interrupts.

settings.title: Science Unlocks Nature
settings.content: We see the powerful potential in nature and the ingredients it gives us. Through cutting-edge science, we have the ability to unlock this potential, push it beyond its known possibilities, and create solutions that actually work. We sit in in the sweet spot between science and nature because, for us, we can’t have one without the other.

settings.title: Be the Positive Change
settings.content: Finally, we are driven by a greater ambition to inspire  positive change. To always put people and the planet first,  constantly pushing the benchmark for ourselves and others,  and always exceeding expectations.

settings.subheading_1: Damage Due to Freight Or Shipping
settings.title: Terms of Sale and refund conditions
settings.content_1: Complete terms of purchase are provided at checkout. By agreeing to the terms and conditions you agree that you understand that the products purchased, whether consumable or topical, contain cannabinoids from hemp oil. While our manufacturing facilities are registered with the FDA and our products are manufactured according to FDA guidelines for cGMP standards for dietary supplements, they are not themselves dietary supplements. Our products have not been evaluated by the FDA, and we make no claims as to any capacity for our products to diagnose, treat, mitigate, cure or prevent any disease. By purchasing our products, you acknowledge that you do so based upon your own opinions as to any benefits these products may provide. All products carry a 30-day customer satisfaction guarantee. If you are not satisfied with any of these products, simply return the unused portion of the product. If we receive a returned product within 30 days, we will issue a full refund. Your acceptance of the terms of purchase means you agree to and understand the refund policy.
settings.content_2: All of our products are tested for quality, and all shipments are carefully inspected before leaving our warehouse. Upon delivery of your order, please check product carefully to ensure it has not been damaged during shipping. All claims for damaged product must be made with 48 hours after delivery. Please contact us and provide detailed information for any product damaged during shipping within that time. Please include a full description of the damages to the product.

settings.terms_of_sale:
TERMS OF SALE AND REFUND POLICY

SHIPPING POLICYShipments; Delivery; Title and Risk of Loss

  • All prices, discounts, and promotions posted on this Website are subject to change without notice. The price charged for a product or service will be the price advertised on this Website at the time the order is placed, subject to the Terms of Use and this Terms of Sale and Refund Policy along with any promotions or discounts that may be applicable. The price charged will be clearly stated in your order confirmation email. Price increases will only apply to orders placed after the time of the increase. Posted prices do not include taxes or charges for shipping and handling. All such taxes and charges will be added to your total price, and will be itemized in your shopping cart and in your order confirmation email. We strive to display accurate price information, however we may, on occasion, make inadvertent typographical errors, inaccuracies or omissions related to pricing and availability. We reserve the right to correct any errors, inaccuracies, or omissions at any time and to cancel any orders arising from such occurrences.

  • Terms of payment are within our sole discretion and payment must be received by us before our acceptance of an order. We accept Mastercard, Visa, American Express and Discover credit cards for all purchases. By purchasing with a credit card, you represent and warrant that:

    • The credit card information you supply to us is true, correct and complete.
    • You are duly authorized to use such credit card for the purchase.
    • Charges incurred by you will be honored by your credit card company.
    • You will pay charges incurred by you at the posted prices, including shipping and handling charges and all applicable taxes, if any, regardless of the amount quoted on the Website at the time of your order.
  • By agreeing to the Terms of Use you agree that you understand that the products purchased, whether consumable or topical, contain cannabinoids from hemp oil. While our manufacturing facilities are registered with the FDA and our products are manufactured according to FDA guidelines for cGMP standards for dietary supplements, they are not themselves dietary supplements. Our products have not been evaluated by the FDA, and we make no claims as to any capacity for our products to diagnose, treat, mitigate, cure or prevent any disease. By purchasing our products, you acknowledge that you do so based upon your own opinions as to any benefits these products may provide. All products carry a thirty (30) day customer satisfaction guarantee.

Refund Policy.
Except for any products designated on the Website as non-returnable, we will accept a return of the products for a refund of your purchase price, less the original shipping and handling costs, provided such return is made within thirty (30) days of delivery with valid proof of purchase and provided such products are returned in their original condition. Please contact us at: (1-833-HEALIST) or email our Customer Service Department at customerservice@healistnaturals.com to obtain a Return Merchandise Authorization ("RMA") number before shipping your product. No returns of any type will be accepted without an RMA number.

You are responsible for all shipping and handling charges on returned items unless otherwise specified. You bear the risk of loss during shipment. We therefore strongly recommend that you fully insure your return shipment against loss or damage and that you use a carrier that can provide you with proof of delivery for your protection. All returns are subject to a (INSERT PERCENTAGE HERE) restocking fee.

Refunds are processed within approximately three (3) business days of our receipt of your merchandise. Your refund will be credited back to the same payment method used to make the original purchase on the Website. WE OFFER NO REFUNDS ON ANY PRODUCTS DESIGNATED ON THIS SITE AS NON-RETURNABLE.
settings.shipping_policy:
SHIPPING POLICY

Shipments; Delivery; Title and Risk of Loss

  • We will arrange for shipment of the products to you. Please check the individual product page for specific delivery options. You will pay all shipping and handling charges unless otherwise specified in the order confirmation.
  • Title and risk of loss pass to you upon our transfer of the products to the carrier. Shipping and delivery dates are estimates only and cannot be guaranteed. We are not liable for any delays in shipments.

Damage due to Freight or Shipping.

All of our products are tested for quality, and all shipments are carefully inspected before leaving our warehouse. Upon delivery of your order, please check the product carefully to ensure it has not been damaged during shipping. All claims for damaged product must be made within forty-eight (48) hours after delivery. Please contact us at: (1-833-HEALIST) or email our Customer Service Department at customerservice@healistnaturals.com. When you contact us, please provide detailed information for any product damaged during shipping within that time. Please include your order number and a full description of the damages to the product.
settings.copyright_policy:
Copyright Policy

Reporting Claims of Copyright Infringement
We take claims of copyright infringement seriously. We will respond to notices of alleged copyright infringement that comply with applicable law. If you believe any materials accessible on or from this site (the “Website”) infringe your copyright, you may request removal of those materials (or access to them) from the Website by submitting written notification to our copyright agent designated below. In accordance with the Online Copyright Infringement Liability Limitation Act of theDigital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C. § 512) (”DMCA”), the written notice (the“DMCA Notice”) must include substantially the following:

  • Your physical or electronic signature.
  • Identification of the copyrighted work you believe to have been infringed or, if the claim involves multiple works on the Website, a representative list of such works.
  • Identification of the material you believe to be infringing in a sufficiently precise manner to allow us to locate that material.
  • Adequate information by which we can contact you (including your name, postal address, telephone number, and, if available, email address).
  • A statement that you have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
  • A statement that the information in the written notice is accurate
  • A statement, under penalty of perjury, that you are authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner.

Our designated copyright agent to receive DMCA Notices is:

Present Life Corp.
ATTN: HEALIST NATURALS Legal Department
84 WEST WALNUT STREET, SUITE 201
ASHEVILLE, NC 28801

If you fail to comply with all of the requirements of Section 512(c)(3) of the DMCA, your DMCA Notice may not be effective. Please be aware that if you knowingly materially misrepresent that material or activity on the Website is infringing your copyright, you may be held liable for damages (including costs and attorneys’ fees)under Section 512(f) of the DMCA.

Counter Notification ProceduresIf you believe that material you posted on the Website was removed or access to it was disabled by mistake or misidentification, you may file a counter notification with us (a “Counter Notice”) by submitting written notification to our copyright agent designated below. Pursuant to the DMCA, the Counter Notice must include substantially the following:

  • Your physical or electronic signature.
  • An identification of the material that has been removed or to which access has been disabled and the location at which the material appeared before it was removed or access disabled.
  • Adequate information by which we can contact you (including your name, postal address, telephone number, and, if available, email address).
  • A statement under penalty of perjury by you that you have a good faith belief that the material identified above was removed or disabled as a result of a mistake or misidentification of the material to be removed or disabled.
  • A statement that you will consent to the jurisdiction of the of the FederalDistrict Court for the judicial district in which your address is located (or if you're outside the United States for any judicial district in which the Website may be found) and that you will accept service from the person (or an agent of that person) who provided the Website with the complaint at issue.

Our designated agent to receive Counter Notices is:
Present Life Corp.
ATTN:HEALIST NATURALS Legal Department
84 WEST WALNUT STREET, SUITE 201
ASHEVILLE, NC 28801

The DMCA allows us to restore the removed content if the party filing the originalDMCA Notice does not file a court action against you within ten business days of receiving the copy of your Counter Notice.

Please be aware that if you knowingly materially misrepresent that material or activity on the Website was removed or disabled by mistake or misidentification, you may be held liable for damages (including costs and attorneys' fees) underSection 512(f) of the DMCA.

Repeat Infringers
It is our policy in appropriate circumstances to disable and/or terminate the accounts of users who are repeat infringers.

settings.privacy_copy:
PRIVACY POLICY

This Privacy Policy is a part of our Terms of Use. By using this Website or our online store, you agree to be bound by and comply with this Privacy Policy and our Terms of Use.

  • Age Restrictions on Access and Purchases.
    You must be at least 18 years old to access this site. If you are under 18 years old you are not permitted to use this site for any reason. You must be of legal age required by the state or province you are in to purchase our products. It is your responsibility to know whether you are legally able to purchase our products.

    If we learn we have collected or received personal information from a child under the age of 18 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under the age of 18, please contact us at: customerservice@healistnaturals.com.

  • What Information Do We Gather and What Do We Do With it?
    When you purchase something from our online store, as part of the buying and selling process, we collect the personal information you give us such as your name, address and email address and order history. We also use cookies, web beacons or other tools that collect information that make it easier to use our store and our site.

    When you visit our site, some information is automatically collected. This may include information such as the Operating System (OS) running on your device, Internet Protocol (IP) address (which may be used to obtain your geolocation), access times, browser type, and language, and the website you visited before our site. We also collect information about how you use our site, including the elements you have interacted with, metadata and other details about these elements, change states and other user actions.

    Email marketing: By providing us with your email address, you are giving us permission to send you emails about our store, new products and other updates. You have the opportunity to unsubscribe from these emails at any time by clicking the “Unsubscribe” button included at the bottom of each email.

    In general, we use the information we collect primarily to provide, maintain, protect and improve our current site and products and to develop new products. We use personal information collected through our site as described below and described elsewhere in this Policy to:

    • Facilitate the creation of and securing of your Account on our network;
    • Identify you as a user in our system;
    • Improve our products, site, and how we operate our business;
    • Understand and enhance user experience of our site and products;
    • Provide and deliver the products and services you request;
    • Respond to your comments or questions and for our Support team to provide service;
    • Send you related information, including confirmations, invoices, technical notices, updates, security alerts and support and administrative messages;
    • Communicate with you about promotions, upcoming events and news about products and services offered by Healist and our selected partners, and for other marketing purposes of Healist;
    • Link or combine your information with other information we get from third parties to help understand your needs and provide you with better service; and
    • Protect, investigate and deter against fraudulent, unauthorized or illegal activity.

    California Privacy Rights
    If you are a California resident, California law may provide you with additional rights regarding the use of your personal information. To learn more about your California privacy rights, visit this page.

  • Consent

    • How do you get my consent?
      By executing a transaction, and any time you provide us with personal information for the purpose of completing a transaction, placing an order, arranging for a delivery or return of a purchase you consent to us collecting and using your information as described herein. Your credit card information is handled in a unique and specific way, as discussed in Section 5 below).

    • How do I withdraw my consent?
      You may withdraw your consent for us to use your personal information and from receiving email communications by clicking the “Unsubscribe” button included at the bottom of each email or contacting us at customerservice@healistnaturals.com.

  • Disclosure.
    We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent other than with the following:

    • Third Party Service Providers.We sometimes provide customer information to third-party partners who work on our behalf, provided that such third parties provide at least the same level of privacy protection as required by this Privacy Policy and use it only for the purposes for which we disclose it to them;
    • Lawful Requests.We provide customer information when required by law or to respond to lawful requests by law enforcement and other government agencies. We agree to notify you at the address you have given us if we have received a lawful request for your information;
    • Protection of Rights and Property.We provide customer information when required by law or to respond to lawful requests by law enforcement and other government agencies. We agree to notify you at the address you have given us if we have received a lawful request for your information;
    • Emergency.In an emergency, including to protect the personal safety of any person; and
    • Corporate Restructuring.For the purposes of a business deal (or negotiation of a business deal) involving the sale or transfer of all or a part of our business or assets including but not limited to merger, acquisition, refinancing through outside investment, divestiture or dissolution. In the event of an insolvency, bankruptcy, or receivership, personal information may also be transferred as a business asset. If another company acquires our company, including its business and assets, that company will also acquire and possess the personal information collected by us and will assume the rights and obligations regarding your personal information as described in this Policy.

  • Payment Processing.
    Our store is built on an e-commerce software platform called Shopify that allows us to sell our products and services to you.

    Payment: If you provide us with your credit card information during the payment process, we send it to our PCI-DSS compliant payment gateway for processing using SSL encryption technology. Your credit card information is never stored for use beyond the transaction for which it was supplied.

    All direct payment gateways comply with the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover.

    PCI-DSS requirements help ensure the secure handling of credit card information by our store and our payment processors and service providers

  • Third-Party Services.
    Our Policy does not cover any third-party services. To learn about those third parties' privacy practices, please read their privacy policies.

    Links: When you click on links on our store, they may direct you away from our site. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of other sites and encourage you to read their privacy policies.

  • Security.
    To protect your personal information, we take reasonable precautions and follow generally accepted industry practices to make sure it is not inappropriately lost, misused, accessed, disclosed, altered or destroyed. Your personal information is protected by your password – never share this password with anyone. Healist will never contact you to ask you for your password.

    If you provide us with your credit card information, the information is transmitted to our server using secure socket layer technology (SSL) which employs the AES-256 encryption standard.

    Unfortunately, the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. Although we do our best to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee the security of your personal information transmitted to our website. Any transmission of personal information is at your own risk. We are not responsible for the circumvention of any privacy settings or security measures contained on the website.

  • Age of Consent.
    Our website is not intended for children under 18 years of age. No one under the age of 18 may provide information to or on the website. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you are under 18, do not use or provide any information on this website, through any of its features, register on the website, make purchases on the website, or provide any information about yourself to us, including your name, address, telephone number, or email address.

    By using this site, you represent that you are at least 18 years of age, or that you are the age of majority in your state or province of residence and you consent to any of your minor dependents using this site.

  • United States Law Applies.
    This site is intended for users located in the United States. By sending us your Personal Information from outside the U.S., you consent to the application of U.S. law and to the use and disclosure of your personal information consistent with this Privacy Policy. It is up to you to determine whether accessing this site and purchasing our products are legal where you are. You access this site and purchase our products at your own risk, and you are responsible for compliance with all applicable laws, rules, regulations and treaties in the country where you reside, or where the products are destined.

  • Changes to This Privacy Policy.
    We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time, so please review it frequently. It is our policy to post any changes we make to our Privacy Policy on this page (with a notice that the Privacy Policy has been updated on the website’s homepage). If we make material changes to how we treat our users’ personal information, we will notify you by email to the email address specified in your account and through a notice on our website’s home page. You are responsible for ensuring we have an up-to-date active and deliverable email address for your, and for periodically visiting our website and this Privacy Policy to check for any changes. Changes and clarifications will take effect immediately upon their posting on the website.

Questions and Contact Information. If you would like to: access, correct, amend or delete any personal information we have about you (other than that information automatically generated by your use of our site), register a complaint, or simply want more information, please contact our customer service team at: (1-833-HEALIST) or email us at: customerservice@healistnaturals.com.
